attributes.action: to allow England their own National Anthem (As we are the only home nation without one!) I Suggest, "Land of hope and glory" would be a fine choice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"God save the Queen" is fine as the anthem for the UK, but it's time us English had our own anthem. How strange when England play Scotland at football that the Scotish have their own song but the English have to play the national anthem of the UK (Which includes Scotland!)
I suggest "Land of hope and glory" as used for England at the Commonwealth games would make the hairs stand up on the neck of any true patriot.

Respect other nations, but be proud to be English.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
